languages.text: {n}Даже после вашего ухода фигура эльдарки остается недвижимой, и ни единый мускул на ее лице, ни единая тень не смеет двинутся с места.{/n}
{n}Even after you leave, Yrliet remains frozen, and not a single muscle on her face nor a single shadow dares to break the stillness.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Даже после вашего ухода фигура эльдарки остается недвижимой, и ни единый мускул на ее лице, ни единая тень не смеет двинутся с места.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Even after you leave, Yrliet remains frozen, and not a single muscle on her face nor a single shadow dares to break the stillness.{/n}
{n}Even after you leave, Yrliet remains frozen, and not a single muscle on her face nor a single shadow dares to break the stillness.{/n}
{n}Even after you leave, Yrliet remains frozen, and not a single muscle on her face nor a single shadow dares to break the stillness.{/n}
{n}Even after you leave, Yrliet remains frozen, and not a single muscle on her face nor a single shadow dares to break the stillness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Incluso después de que te vayas, Yrliet permanece inerte; no hay un solo músculo de su rostro, ni siquiera una leve sombra, que se atrevan a romper su quietud.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even after you leave, Yrliet remains frozen, and not a single muscle on her face nor a single shadow dares to break the stillness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incluso después de que te vayas, Yrliet permanece inerte; no hay un solo músculo de su rostro, ni siquiera una leve sombra, que se atrevan a romper su quietud.{/n}

languages.text: {n}立ち去った後もユリエットは硬直したままで、顔の筋肉は一切動かず、顔に落ちた影も形を崩さない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even after you leave, Yrliet remains frozen, and not a single muscle on her face nor a single shadow dares to break the stillness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}立ち去った後もユリエットは硬直したままで、顔の筋肉は一切動かず、顔に落ちた影も形を崩さない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}即使在你离开之后，伊莉耶特依然保持着静止不动。她脸上的每块肌肉、每处阴影，都不敢打破这样的寂静。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even after you leave, Yrliet remains frozen, and not a single muscle on her face nor a single shadow dares to break the stillness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}即使在你离开之后，伊莉耶特依然保持着静止不动。她脸上的每块肌肉、每处阴影，都不敢打破这样的寂静。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet reste figée, même après votre départ. Pas un muscle de son visage ni aucune ombre n'ose rompre son immobilité.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even after you leave, Yrliet remains frozen, and not a single muscle on her face nor a single shadow dares to break the stillness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet reste figée, même après votre départ. Pas un muscle de son visage ni aucune ombre n'ose rompre son immobilité.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Selbst, nachdem du gegangen bist, bleibt Yrliet wie eingefroren. Kein einziger Muskel auf ihrem Gesicht und kein einziger Schatten wagt, die Stille zu durchbrechen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even after you leave, Yrliet remains frozen, and not a single muscle on her face nor a single shadow dares to break the stillness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Selbst, nachdem du gegangen bist, bleibt Yrliet wie eingefroren. Kein einziger Muskel auf ihrem Gesicht und kein einziger Schatten wagt, die Stille zu durchbrechen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, donakalmış bedenini sen ayrıldıktan sonra dahi kımıldatmıyor. Durgunluğunu bozmaya yüzündeki tek bir kas, tek bir gölge bile cüret edemiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Even after you leave, Yrliet remains frozen, and not a single muscle on her face nor a single shadow dares to break the stillness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, sen ayrıldıktan sonra bile donakalan bedenini kımıldatmıyor. Durgunluğunu bozmaya yüzündeki tek bir kas, tek bir gölge bile cüret edemiyor.{/n}
